  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AuthController
    The AuthController handles authentication and registration operations.
    CafeteriaController
    The CafeteriaController serves as the RESTful API entry point for managing cafeterias.
    OrderController
    The OrderController serves as the RESTful API entry point for managing orders.
    PasswordController
    The PasswordController provides RESTful endpoints for password reset functionality.
    ProductController
    The ProductController serves as the RESTful API entry point for managing products.
    ReviewController
    The ReviewController serves as the RESTful API entry point for managing reviews.
    UserController
    The UserController serves as the RESTful API entry point for managing users.
